content.question: A historian could best use Lord Kenyonâ€™s attitude toward witchcraft in Source 1 as evidence of which of the following?

choices.label: The embrace of folk beliefs by elites
The increasing involvement of women in commercial activities
The ongoing social and religious tensions in England as a result of the Reformation

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
